page.title: 07FARMING
page.content: My name is Craig. Iam a farmer's son. We have a farm near the village of West Linton. I am going to tell you what I did on a Saturday in June when I was not at school. I got up at 7.30,had my breakfast and went out on my 3 wheeler byke to collect cattle feed from the barn. I then went with my dad to the big field to feed the calves that had been weaned. We then went to inspect the cows that had recently calved to see if they had the "Staggers"- a disease that cows sometimes get, After my father had had his breakfast we went to gather sheep with Meg the dog. We went on motor bykes and the dog could go where the byke could not go. I had to take a stray hog back to the field. When I had finished helping my father I cut the grass outside the farmhouse. My father then gave me my pocket money
